Ethnio may disclose Personal Data to subcontractors and third-party agents who assist us in providing Services to our customers and prospects.
Onward Transfers

Ethnio may also be required to disclose, and may disclose, Personal Data in response to lawful requests by public authorities, including for the purpose of meeting national security or law enforcement requirements.

In making modifications to their Personal Data, Data Subjects must provide only truthful, complete, and accurate information.
